mapper.select: select no,writer,pwd,title,content,regdate,hit,fname,b_ref,b_step,b_level from (select rownum n,a.* from (select * from board order by b_ref desc,b_step)a) where n between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update board set b_step = b_step+1 where b_ref=#{b_ref} and b_step > #{b_step}
update board set title=#{title},content=#{content},fname=#{fname} where no=#{no} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.delete: delete board where no=#{no} and pwd=#{pwd}
